tooltips.strainers.improved_input_upgrad: §aInput items have a 20% chance to not be consumed.
§aInput items have a 40% chance to not be consumed.
tooltips.strainers.reinforced_input_upgr: §aInput items have a 60% chance to not be consumed.
tooltips.strainers.everlasting_input_upg: §aInput items have a 80% chance to not be consumed.
tooltips.strainers.improved_mesh_upgrade: §aMeshes have a 20% chance to not be damaged when used.
tooltips.strainers.sturdy_mesh_upgrade.s: §aMeshes have a 40% chance to not be damaged when used.
tooltips.strainers.reinforced_mesh_upgra: §aMeshes have a 60% chance to not be damaged when used.
tooltips.strainers.everlasting_mesh_upgr: §aMeshes have a 80% chance to not be damaged when used.
tooltips.strainers.improved_duration_upg: §aA recipe duration is dropped to 80% of total duration.
tooltips.strainers.sturdy_duration_upgra: §aA recipe duration is dropped to 60% of total duration.
tooltips.strainers.reinforced_duration_u: §aA recipe duration is dropped to 40% of total duration.
tooltips.strainers.everlasting_duration_: §aA recipe duration is dropped to 20% of total duration.
tooltips.strainers.improved_output_upgra: §aRecipe outputs have a 20% additional chance to do an extra roll.
tooltips.strainers.sturdy_output_upgrade: §aRecipe outputs have a 40% additional chance to do an extra roll.
tooltips.strainers.reinforced_output_upg: §aRecipe outputs have a 60% additional chance to do an extra roll.
tooltips.strainers.everlasting_output_up: §aRecipe outputs have a 80% additional chance to do an extra roll.
tooltips.strainers.specialized_speed_upg: §aDuration decreased to 20 ticks!§r,§c Meshes take 5x more damage!
tooltips.strainers.specialized_mesh_upgr: §aMeshes never take damage!§r,§c Duration increased by 1.5x!
tooltips.strainers.specialized_input_upg: §aInput items are never consumed!§r,§c Meshes take 10x more damage!, Duration increased by 4x!
jei.strainers.purified_water: Right click on a Block of Mulch with Purifying Salt Mulch to create a source block of Purified Water.
jei.strainers.eroding_water: Right click on a Block of Mulch with Eroding Salt Mulch to create a source block of Eroding Water.
jei.strainers.mulch_block:
Right click with a hoe to create a source block of Water.

Right click on a Block of Mulch with Eroding Salt Mulch to create a source block of Eroding Water.

Right click on a Block of Mulch with Eroding Salt Mulch to create a source block of Eroding Water.
